info.name: Chrome - Dark Stylus
info.description:
Dark theme for the Stylus extension (chrome only).
UserStyles says "Not Available on Chrome" but I have no clue why so manual installation is currently the only choice.
info.additionalInfo:
20/02/04 - Added scrollbars
20/02/04 - Fixed options dialog and switches
20/02/01 - Fixed background for the style deletion popup
